arts.ttl: Gareth Ainsworth reacts to first Shrewsbury Town defeat
arts.sum: "Second half Blackpool were always going to be tough with the wind right in our faces it was a tough night, the conditions played a part, believe me, but we also gifted a couple of goals that I think, well I know, we can stop having looked at them, and I know what I will be working on. But two goals in five second-half minutes turned the game on its head for Town as they fell to a 12th defeat of the season and dropped to the bottom of the League One table.

arts.ttl: Shrewsbury Town Women ready to make supporters proud against Wolves
arts.sum: There is a mouthwatering clash in store for Salop as they play in the third round of the FA Cup for the first time in their history on Sunday at the New Bucks Head - the home of Wolves Women. But despite the difference in levels, Hudson-Jones believes Salop can cause a cup upset.

arts.ttl: Blackpool come from behind to send Shrewsbury to the bottom of League One
arts.sum: The hosts had led through Mal Benningâ€™s early goal.

Following four straight defeats, Shrewsbury produced arguably the shock result of the League One campaign after beating Birmingham 3-2. The Shrews are now going for consecutive league wins for the fi...
